properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 4:34AM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Updated timing.

* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet. Highest along the east sides of
the lake.

* WHERE...Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to
capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions
improve Sunday.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON FOR PYRAMID LAKE
